name: MT-URL-Uploader
description: An url uploader bot with permenent thumbnail support

WEBHOOK.description: Leave this as it is! ANYTHING

BOT_TOKEN.description: Your bot token from @botfather, as a string.

APP_ID.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from https://my.telegram.org or @MT_MyTelegramOrg_Bot

AUTH_USERS.description: allow only pre-defined users to use this bot
